mapper.insert:
insert into report_salecontract(docNo, businessDate, itemName, orderPrice, contactQtyPU, totalMnyTC, customerName,deliverQty ) values
(#{item.docNo},#{item.businessDate},#{item.itemName},#{item.orderPrice},#{item.contactQtyPU},#{item.totalMnyTC},#{item.customerName},#{item.deliverQty})
